definition: at one go/at a stretch/for a period of time/forming a gang
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
in a fit of pique/in a fury
to do something at one go/to flow smoothly
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
to act in collusion (idiom)

sentences.english: Like an animal at bay, the bandit chieftain laid about in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 土匪头子困兽犹斗，在绝望中向四面八方乱打一气。

sentences.english: Black ant cant stand stimulation in a pet like the giant killer.
sentences.chinese: 黑蚁受不了激，一气之下就想对擎天下杀手。

sentences.english: In his flay, he screwed up her letter and threw it into the wastepaper basket.
sentences.chinese: 他一气之下，把她写来的信揉成一团，扔进了。

sentences.english: So, I got the refrigerator and pushed it over the balcony and it crushed him.
sentences.chinese: 一气之下，我搬出冰箱，推下阳台，砸到了他身上。

sentences.english: The boy doesn't like music at all, so he often strummed on the piano.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩根本不爱好音乐，所以他常在钢琴上乱弹一气。

sentences.english: Finally the captain still did not agree. He was so angry that he went to find the bureau director.
sentences.chinese: 最后大队长还是不同意，他一气之下又去找。

sentences.english: Cao, infuriated, ordered him to the battle front, hoping the enemy's sword would kill him.
sentences.chinese: 曹操一气之下，命他立即出征，借敌人的刀杀了祢衡。
那些人沆瀣一气做坏事。

sentences.english: FAW's HQD Concept is a scary-looking Chinese-style Rolls-Royce Phantom!
sentences.chinese: 一气红旗盛事是一款吓人的中国版劳斯莱斯幻影。

sentences.english: Cao， infuriated， ordered him to the battle front， hoping the enemy's sword would kill him.
sentences.chinese: 曹操一气之下，命他立即出征，借敌人的刀杀了祢衡。

sentences.english: Several companies gang up to raise prices.
sentences.chinese: 几家公司串通一气抬高物价。

sentences.english: After him vomiting and being blinded for a few hours, he was fine!
sentences.chinese: 他大吐一气，眼睛瞎了几个小时之后，跟没事人一样。

sentences.english: Yifan throws a necklace that was given to her by Yiguan into a lake.
sentences.chinese: 一帆一气之下将一官送给她的项链丢进小溪里。

sentences.english: People always conspire to keep the truth from me.
sentences.chinese: 人们总是串通一气不把真情告诉我。

sentences.english: Like an animal at bay, the bandit chieftain laid about him in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 土匪头子困兽犹斗，在绝望中向四面八方乱打一气。

sentences.english: I know who rides with Théoden of Rohan.
sentences.chinese: 我知道谁跟罗翰国的塞奥顿串通一气。

definition: Taixu (famed Buddhist monk, 1890-1947)
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
yin and yang
really/truly/indeed
yin and yang/heaven and earth/the universe
five phases of Chinese philosophy: wood 木, fire 火, earth 土, metal 金, water 水
heaven and earth/yin and yang
thus and so/such and such
let (one) have his way/as (one) pleases/at (one's) will
three sevens are twenty-one (idiom)/the facts of the matter/the actual situation
erhua variant of 一股腦|一股脑[yi1 gu3 nao3]
joined as a string of pearls/in rapid succession/alignment/Renju, a Japanese game, also called Gomoku or five-in-a-row
casually/in passing
(feng shui) beneficial influence, esp. from one's ancestral graves/to confer a beneficial influence

four divisions (of the twenty-eight constellations 二十八宿[er4 shi2 ba1 xiu4] of the sky into groups of seven mansions), namely: Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙[Qing1 long2], White Tiger 白虎[Bai2 hu3], Vermilion Bird 朱雀[Zhu1 que4], Black Tortoise 玄武[Xuan2 wu3]
diagram of cosmological scheme/Yin-Yang symbol ☯
expression/manner/vigorous/impressive/lofty/pretentious
